trans-unit.source: A secure and interoperable binding that supports federated security.
trans-unit.target: 安全且互通的繫結支援聯合的安全性。

trans-unit.source: Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple systems for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: 聯合是共用識別跨多個系統進行驗證和授權的能力。

trans-unit.source: These identities can refer to users or to machines.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別可以指向使用者或電腦。

trans-unit.source: Federated HTTP supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support exclusively using transport security.
trans-unit.target: 聯合的 HTTP 支援 SOAP 安全性以及混合模式安全性，但它不支援獨立使用傳輸安全性。

trans-unit.source: This binding provides [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] support for the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結提供[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]支援 WS-同盟通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: 使用此繫結設定的服務必須使用 HTTP 傳輸。

trans-unit.source: Bindings consist of a stack of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的繫結項目堆疊所組成。

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in WSFederationHttpBinding is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: WSFederationHttpBinding 中繫結項目的堆疊是包含在相同<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>時<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>設為預設值的<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding controls the details of the message security settings, the values of which are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: WSFederationHttpBinding 控制的值都是從執行個體的訊息安全性設定的詳細資料<xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>所傳回<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding also provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A> property to set and retrieve the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: 也提供 WSFederationHttpBinding<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>屬性來設定及擷取隱私權注意事項所在的 URI。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When calling a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service built with [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contains the `establishSecurityContext` attribute in the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 呼叫時[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]與內建服務[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]與內建的 WCF 用戶端應用程式[!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)]或更早版本，將產生的組態檔案由 svcutil.exe 或加入服務參考從[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]包含`establishSecurityContext`繫結組態中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application throws an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext ".
trans-unit.target: 此屬性無法辨識的[!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)]執行階段和應用程式會擲回<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>與訊息附上"Unrecognized 的 attribute establishSecurityContext"。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: To workaround this problem, remove the `establishSecurityContext` attribute from the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決這個問題，請移除`establishSecurityContext`從繫結組態的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定的詳細資料都是從執行個體<xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>所傳回<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>繫結所使用的安全性的指定類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>是<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>指定完整性、 機密性和伺服器和用戶端驗證都可透過提供 SOAP 訊息安全性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定的詳細資料都是從執行個體<xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>所傳回<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> ，指定搭配 SOAP 訊息使用和用戶端的安全性類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>由組態名稱指定的繫結的類別。

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 繫結組態名稱<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configurationName was not found.
trans-unit.target: 具有名稱的繫結項目 configurationName 找不到。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>繫結和值，指出是否啟用可靠工作階段所使用的安全性的指定類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> ，指定搭配 SOAP 訊息使用和用戶端的安全性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用可靠工作階段。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 建立含有繫結項目的繫結的集合。

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements depends on the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> set.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目的堆疊視值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: 繫結中的項目的堆疊<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>中包含的相同<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>時<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>設為預設值的<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>3。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement> However, setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> results in a stack that is something of a hybrid between the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> bindings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>不過，設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>至<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>導致堆疊之間的混合式<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>繫結。</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>3。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement> Finally, using the MTOM encoder looks exactly the same as for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>最後，使用 MTOM 編碼器會尋找完全<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>一樣</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>3。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> that makes up the binding.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>型別的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>，組成繫結。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>已啟用可靠工作階段。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>已啟用可靠工作階段。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Returns the transport binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的繫結傳回傳輸繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>來自目前繫結。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定隱私權注意事項所在的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri>隱私權注意事項所在。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the privacy notice version number for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結的隱私權注意事項版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The version number of the privacy notice.
trans-unit.target: 隱私權注意事項版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此繫結的安全性類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref> that specifies the mode of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"> </xref>指定要搭配此繫結使用的安全性模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> for this binding is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>這個繫結是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>
